articles.content: Five-time overall UCI World Cup Downhill champion, Aaron Gwin, is known to be very particular when it comes to the product he runs on his race bike. Just as his titles go to show, hes out to win, and thats exactly what hes hoping these new Pinner tyres from K… [+4108 chars]

articles.author: By Monica Greep For Mailonline
articles.title: Woman who quit job in high fashion spends six days a week sewing homemade face masks - Daily Mail
articles.description: Amanda Riley, from west London, who quit her job in high fashion is now spending six days a week sewing homemade face masks and has made at least 300 so far, she told The Telegraph.
articles.content:
A woman who quit her job in high fashion has revealed she is now spending six days a week sewing homemade face masks - and has made at least 300 so far.  
Amanda Riley, from west London, set up a business teaching beginners how to sew after rejecting a top j… [+3327 chars]

articles.title: An Apple Watch is credited with saving yet another user from an acute heart condition - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: According to a report published in a medical journal, a patient's Apple Watch successfully detected a serious anomaly missed by diagnostic hospital equipment. However, when the individual pointed out ECGs matching the health issue in question generated by her…
articles.content: The Apple Watch and its built-in heart-rate monitor has already reportedly detected a potentially fatal cardiovascular incident in 1 case; now, it seems the same wearable has done it again. A recent European Heart Journal report describes an incident in which… [+1319 chars]

articles.title: Boss of tiny UK firm ‘extremely optimistic’ his one-a-day pill will combat coronavirus - The Sun
articles.content:
